data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Hamadan, Iran so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hamadan, Iran

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,738,200 citizens of Hamadan, Iran, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 9,055 believers in Hamadan to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Hamadan, Iran.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Laki people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Laki people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Laki people is yours.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Hamadan, Iran, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Hamadan, Iran.
Spirit, help the 9,055 believers in Hamadan to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
